title: Mexico City Update + June 17 Bug Fix Patch
description: The Mexico City map is now live with new NASCAR liveries and a limited-time Chevrolet Bel-Air. A major bug-fix patch on June 17 resolved several performance and UI issues.
changelogs: Rush Hour Race ramp crash fix
Inventory and parts button UI fixes

title: Jaguar Update Released!
description: Four licensed Jaguar vehicles have been added to Greenville, along with new interactive features and a dealership UI revamp.
changelogs: Added 2013 Jaguar XKR-S Convertible (functioning folding top)
New dealership UI with 360° car previews

title: Alpha Tuning Phase 4 + Optimization Update + New Codes
description: DevGem is set to release “Tuning Phase 4” tomorrow! Additionally, the long-awaited Optimization update brings a bunch of new graphics toggle options — and fresh promo codes are active now.
changelogs: Retuning of all vehicles with chassis upgrade to A‑Chassis 1.5P
Updated vehicle stats to match chassis changes
Active new redeemable codes: Alpha (5 M ¥)

title: Revamp & Licensed Cars + GM Removal
description: SWFL’s major Revamp update is incoming—teasing new licensed cars, full map overhaul, and removal of GM-branded vehicles.
